channel.title: Need Help
channel.description: Hello.. I need help changing the drops of a monster.. I have drops for a Baby Blue Dragons.. I edited npcdrops.cfg I have this [code]npcdrop = 0052 995 100 100 //Baby_Blue_Dragons[/code] It works , but when i add another drop , for example [code]npcdrop = 0052 1149 1 100 //Baby_Blue_Dragons npcdrop = 0052 4151 1 100[/code] Then I run server , it works. I kill a Blue Dragon , and i get an error like this.. [code]`Error: T2 - 44,85,44 - 5,3244,9362 - 31,30,0,1,0,[/code] Any help here??? Note : I`m using Devolution V7..

item.title: Need Help
item.dc:creator: @Olli3 Olli3
item.description:
@Olli3 wrote:

Hello… I need help changing the drops of a monster…
I have drops for a Baby Blue Dragons… I edited npcdrops.cfg
I have this npcdrop = 0052 995 100 100 //Baby_Blue_Dragons
It works , but when i add another drop , for example

npcdrop = 0052 1149 1 100 //Baby_Blue_Dragons npcdrop = 0052 4151 1 100
Then I run server , it works.
I kill a Blue Dragon , and i get an error like this…

`Error: T2 - 44,85,44 - 5,3244,9362 - 31,30,0,1,0,

Any help here???
Note : I`m using Devolution V7…

Read full topic
